医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
糖尿病性视网膜疾病患病率上升，而严重病例下降尽管自2014年以来，与糖尿病相关的眼病的患病率几乎翻了一番，但宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的一项研究人员领导的一项新研究实际上降低了这种疾病的最严重形式的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/diabetic-retinal-disease-prevalence-prevalence-rises-while-severe-cases-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/diabetic-retinal-disease-prevalence-prevalence-rises-while-severe-cases-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4756611-1DA1-4952-90B4-9797ED023868 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:33:20 -0500 Diabetic retinal disease prevalence rises while severe cases decline
USC研究阐明了全国纳洛酮的意识和使用一项由USC领导的新研究提供了有关谁知道，携带和使用纳洛酮来逆转致命阿片类药物过量的第一张图片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/usc-study-sheds-light-on-nation-nation-nation-nationwide-naloxone-naloxone-anoxone-avareness-and-saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/usc-study-sheds-light-on-nation-nationwide-nationwide-naloxone-naloxone-anoxone-atecon- and varenes-and-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c742e7a6-d316-41d4-8196-9b7a7aeafb6ad Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:27:23 -0500 USC study sheds light on nationwide naloxone awareness and use
基于AI的青光眼筛查可以彻底改变眼睛健康想象一下，走进一家超市，火车站或购物中心，并在几秒钟内将眼睛筛选为青光眼，而无需预约。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/AI-基于glaucoma-screening-creening-coold-revolutionize-eye-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/AI-基于glaucoma-screening-creening-coold-revolutionize-eye-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21E3F858-D291-466B-B45E-EED-EED-EED9F5B41279 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:21:07 -0500 AI-based glaucoma screening could revolutionize eye health
非侵入性40Hz伽马刺激可以帮助与阿尔茨海默氏症作战在皮科尔（Picower）学习和记忆的科学家在麻省理工学院（MIT）的科学家开始测试大脑的40Hz“伽马”频率节奏是否可以治疗小鼠的阿尔茨海默氏病，这是一个越来越多的证据基础，它支持它可以改善人类健康状况的人，以及来自实验室的工作中的动物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/non-inon-Invasive-40Hz-gamma-stimulution-could-help-fight-fight-alzheimere 28099s.saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/non-inon-Invasive-40Hz-gamma-stimulution-could-help-fight-fight-alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72e4aba0-ca42-446c-bae3-a3c078b418bc Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:16:09 -0500 Non-invasive 40Hz gamma stimulation could help fight Alzheimer’s
一个小时的葡萄糖耐量测试可以彻底改变产后糖尿病筛查照顾婴儿是一项全职工作，通常会导致新妈妈忽略自己的健康需求。在患有妊娠糖尿病的妇女中，对产后葡萄糖筛查的依从性低的依从性大大增加了其后来生活中患2型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/one-hour-glucose-tolerance-tollance-test-could-could-revolutionsize-postpartpartum-diaberetes-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/oone-hour-glucose-tolerance-tollance-test-test-could-could-revolutions-postpartpartum-diaberetes-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89198AD7-1790-4862-B0BC-7A69023A1191 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:39:56 -0500 One-hour glucose tolerance test could revolutionize postpartum diabetes screening
研究阐明了将ER膜重塑与癌细胞中凋亡的机制凋亡是一种高度炎症类型的程序性细胞死亡，它因其在癌症治疗中的潜力而引起了人们的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-elucidates-mechanism-connecting-er-membrane-remodeling-to-proloptosis-in-cancer-cancer-cellsers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-Elucidates-mechanism-connecting-er-membrane-remodeling-to-protoptosis-in-cancer-incancer-cellser-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709C5206-04D9-4951-ADD7-F256CD52F1EB Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:34:16 -0500 Study elucidates mechanism connecting ER membrane remodeling to pyroptosis in cancer cells
PDHX乙酰化的新机制与肝细胞癌进展有关已知癌细胞有利于有氧糖酵解能量生产，这一现象称为Warburg效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/novel-mechanism-of-of-pdhx-acetylation-ton-to-hepatocellular-carcinomal-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/novel-mechanism-of-pdhx-acetylation-to--hepatocellular-carcinomal-carcinoma-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f30693f-f3bf-4ed5-967f-cf0dfb2ca794 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:31:12 -0500 Novel mechanism of PDHX acetylation linked to hepatocellular carcinoma progression
非专家对孕妇和产后个体有效的非专家提供的谈话疗法大约五分之一的怀孕和产后患者患有抑郁和焦虑，但不到10％的人接受了适当的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/talk-therapy-delivered-by-non-pecialists-forcective-forgor-pregnant-and-pregnant-and-postpartum-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/talk-therapy-delivered-by-non-specialists-forcective-for-pregnant-pregnant-and-pregnant-and-postpartum-individuals.aspx#comments.comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8694942-71A3-4B94-9BF5-607225C7C307 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:26:17 -0500 Talk therapy delivered by non-specialists effective for pregnant and postpartum individuals
研究揭示了虐待儿童的主要父母风险因素虐待儿童一直是乌克大学研究人员领导的两项独立研究的重点，他们研究了导致虐待儿童的父母的主要风险因素，以及后来生活中的行为影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/Research-reveals-key-parental-risk-factors-for-for-child-abuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/research-reveals-key-parental-risk-risk-factors-for-child-child-abuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1669d39d39-1f31-49ee-bbcd-499bcd-499bc6dd9d9d9a Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:20:31 -0500 Research reveals key parental risk factors for child abuse
致幻剂的使用与急诊患者死亡风险增加有关根据CMAJ发表的一项新研究，寻求急诊治疗致幻剂使用的人在5年内的死亡风险比一般人群高2.6倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/hallucinogen-use-link-----------------------of-mortality-in-grendational-engergerence-care-care-care-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/hallucinogen-use-link---------------------of-mortality-in-ergergency-care-care-care-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc62ddc2dc2-20c3-4c6e-a271-b25cca59bde4 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 11:13:57 -0500 Hallucinogen use linked to increased risk of mortality in emergency care patients
